page.title: 03Entertainment
page.content: Most of the local entertainment is held in the two community centres of Alltwen and Rhos. Both can be hired for puppet shows, private dances, concerts and discos. Alltwen Community Centre has two dance classes, Contemporary Dance which is funded by West Wales Arts and Ballet classes held twice weekly for which children pay Â£11 a term. Mamma Mia, a night club, has been open for 17 months. It holds 450 people and 31 people work there. It has 3 bars, a restaurant and snack bar. It is open 6 nights a week and can be hired for parties on Mondays. On Tuesdays there is a disco for over 15s and over 18s. Wednesday is cabaret and disco night. Thursday is ladies night, women go in free but men pay. Discos on Friday & Saturday are popular with the local youngsters.
